name: PONG (Policy of National Government)
description:
A technological breakthrough, the Government has spared no expense to bring you this latest training simulation, set up for immigration-staff recruitment.

Learn about the intricacies of immigration policy

Practice your people-skills in the field

Be part of an efficient, results-focussed organisation

A computer browser experience for two candidates

(For complete transparency, please note that our $1M budget has been exceeded. Future phases of this project have now been put out for tender. Phase II will include the addition of game audio. Our R&D department is now working on a revolutionary artificial intelligence module for Phase III, so candidates can experience even more immersive and realistic scenarios).
